changeSet.comment: Switch voltage level and substation filters from genericFilter filter_type to substationOrVoltageLevelFilter
changeSet.sql: UPDATE spreadsheet_global_filter SET filter_type = 'substationOrVoltageLevelFilter' WHERE (equipment_type = 'VOLTAGE_LEVEL' OR equipment_type = 'SUBSTATION') AND filter_type = 'genericFilter';
